resources.string: 3D live wallpaper that used BOIDS algorithm
The number of sardines that display it is specified.
Please select the number of sardines that display it.
The passing speed that is basic of the sardine is specified.
Please select the passing speed where the sardine swims.
Please choose this so that you change the number of sardine or speed.

Explanation:
 This is 3D live Wallpaper simulating a school of sardines which used BOIDS algorithm.
 with Hammerhead Shark.
 Sardines each determines the direction of movement according to BOIDS algorithm.
 When there is a Hammerhead Shark near, the sardine is going to be separated.
 Because Hammerhead Shark is an enemy for sardine.
 
 Features:
 1) This simulates "a school of sardines".
 2) You can increase the number of sardine to 100 of them.
 3) You can change the speed that the sardine swims.
 4) You can increase the number of hammerhead shark to 10 of them.
 5) You can change the speed that the hammerhead shark swims.
 6) Sardine comes there when you touched screen.
 7) You can enable "BOIDS" function.
 	You can disable "BOIDS" function.
 8) You can change distance from a viewpoint to the center of the aquarium.
 9) There is a viewpoint mode of a sardine or a viewpoint mode of a hammerhead shark. 
 You seem to have become a sardine or a hammerhead shark.
 
 Requirement:
 1) After Android2.1.
 2) OpenGL ES 1.0.
 3) Over 3MB Heep memory area.
 
 Newly ChangeLog:
 hammer3d (1.0.1) stable; urgency=low
 
 *Improved a part of the BOIDS algorithm
 	Because there was concern at transaction speed,
 	I made processing short in a BOIDS part.
 	However, there was not the need by the improvement
 	of the drawing part. thus I did a BOIDS part properly.
 
 -- Atsushi Konno <konno@qsdn.co.jp> Sun, 31 Jul 2011 19:34:49 +0900
 
 hammer3d (1.0.0) stable; urgency=low
 
 * Initial release.
 	forked from jinbei3d.

This changes it of the distance from a viewpoint to a school of sardine.
Please appoint the distance to a school of sardine
The passing speed that is basic of Hammerhead shark is specified.
Please select the passing speed where hammerhead skark swims.
You can set the view from the perspective of the sardine and a hammerhead shark.
The number of Hammerhead shark that display it is specified.
Please select the number of hammerhead shark that display it.
